mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select imgnum,gnum from ideagroup where gno=#{gNo} and boardname='idea') data) where rnum=1
select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select imgnum,gnum from ideagroup where gno=#{gNo} and boardname='3D') data) where rnum=1
select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select imgnum,gnum from ideagroup where gno=#{gNo} and boardname='sketch') data) where rnum=1
select nvl(gno,0) as gno from ideagroup where gnum=#{gNum}

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select gNum,mId,gSubject,gHitCount,to_char(gCreated,'YYYY-MM-DD') gCreated from ideaGroup where gNo=#{gNo} and boardname=#{boardName} and ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' order by gNum desc) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select nvl(count(*),0) from ideaGroup where gNo=#{gNo} and boardname=#{boardName} and ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
